question: I am contineously doing Isikharah for marriage. but no success.. nothing shows. 9 times i have donr what should i do.?
answer:
QUESTION
Please tell me what is that mean., please tell me soon because i am going for 40 days in 2 days. Jazakalah Khairun
ANSWER


Share:
It is not necessary to see a dream in Istikhaara. The inclination of the heart in any one direction is also a guidance from the Istikhaara.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
